sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import {MDBBtn,MDBTable,MDBTableBody,} from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; import { useState } from "react"; import {FINISHTODO,DELETETODO} from '../Redux/Action/action' import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; const Filter = (props) => { let i=0 let y=0 const dispatch=useDispatch() const finishtask=()=>{ dispatch(FINISHTODO()) } const removetask=()=>{ const todoToDelete = { id: { $oid: todo.id.$oid }, description: props.todos.description, isDone:props.todo.isDone, }; dispatch(DELETETODO(todoToDelete)) } return ( <> { props.searchfilter === "Done" ? props.todos .filter((todo) => { return todo.isDone === true ; }) .map((todo) => ( {i+1} {todo.description} Complete Delete Done )) : props.searchfilter === "Not-Yet" ? props.todos .filter((todo) => { return todo.isDone === false; }) .map((todo) => ( {i+1} {todo.description} {todo.isDone===false?'In progress':'Complete'} Delete Finished )) : props.todos.map((todo) => ( {i+1} {todo.description} {todo.isDone===true ? "Complete":"In progress"} {todo.isDone===true? <> Delete Done : <> Delete Finished } )) } ); } export default Filter ;
